name: Linench
description:
You are trying to pass the levels by thinking or improvising in this cast.
Is it where you hang out? Follow your steps back and try different ways to reach the end.
Achieving the last key will become even harder as the section grows, you can be sure of that.

  • 50 levels and new levels will be added with the updates.
  • Special achievements for your profile.
GameplayThe goal of the game is simple, you are trying to get to the end key using the keys, but this is easy at the first levels, but at the later levels
it can make you very confused. We added different kinds of keys to add fun to our puzzles.Key Types
  • Start and End Keys: The key you start to split and the end key you need to reach to finish the episode.
  • Normal Keys: These keys do not have a special feature.
  • Deactive Keys: You can not use these keys.
  • Portal Keys: These keys carry you from one place to another.
  • Arrow Keys: You can only use these keys in the direction you see them.
  • Multi Keys: You can use these keys more than once.
  • Star Keys: If you have reached the end key, you will not be able to pass the section if you have not used these keys, which will ruin the little game.
ExtraI would like to thank all those who supported this game.
